mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.home_name AS "homeName", a.home_phone AS "homePhone"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO home( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, home_name, home_phone ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{homeName}, #{homePhone} )
mapper.update: UPDATE home SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, home_name = #{homeName}, home_phone = #{homePhone} WHERE id = #{id}
